name: consecrating
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
consecrate
to officially make something holy and able to be used for religious ceremonies: The new cathedral was completed and consecrated in 2002.
to officially give someone the title of bishop in the Christian Church in a religious ceremony
